name: telephonyCredentialAction
description: Perform activate or deactivate action on provided Credential. Activate action will change the status to active, making it possible to connect calls with the credential. Deactivate action will change the status to inactive, making it impossible to connect calls with the credential.

action.description: Identifies the action to be taken.

$ul: **created_at**: ISO-8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
**expires_at**: ISO-8601 formatted date indicating when the resource will expire.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**resource_id**: Identifies the resource this credential is associated with.
**sip_password**: The randomly generated SIP password for the credential.
**sip_username**: The randomly generated SIP username for the credential.
**updated_at**: ISO-8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
